text: Mr. Leonardus Antonius Lightenvelt (27 October 1795, 's-Hertogenbosch Familysearch - 29 October 1873, Hyères) was a Dutch politician. ==References== Category:1795 births Category:1873 deaths Category:Ministers of Foreign Affairs of the Netherlands Category:Ministers of Justice of the Netherlands Category:Members of the Senate (Netherlands) Category:Independent politicians in the Netherlands Category:Dutch lawyers Category:People from 's-Hertogenbosch Category:Leiden University alumni Category:Commanders of the Order of the Netherlands Lion
title: Leonardus Antonius Lightenvelt
